content.en: Steganalysis advancements: Researchers are exploring the use of convolutional neural networks (CNNs) and deep learning techniques to improve steganalysis, which is the detection of hidden data in digital images. These algorithms are being investigated for their ability to extract discriminative features and improve detection accuracy for various types of steganography. The shift from traditional machine learning to deep learning approaches is also being examined in the field of digital image steganalysis.
content.da: Fremskridt inden for steganalyse: Forskere udforsker brugen af convolutional neural networks (CNN'er) og dybdelæringsteknikker for at forbedre steganalyse, som er detektion af skjulte data i digitale billeder. Disse algoritmer bliver undersøgt for deres evne til at udtrække diskriminerende træk og forbedre detektionsnøjagtigheden for forskellige typer steganografi. Skiftet fra traditionel maskinlæring til dybdelæringsmetoder bliver også undersøgt inden for digital billedsteganalyse.
